title: Ticket #5197: MSI installer doesn't set desktop policy when asked to
description: A user reports that the Windows installer asks whether it should set a desktop policy or a no-preemption policy, but it doesn't actually set a desktop policy when asked to.
remarks:
2015-Aug-04 17:05:21 by tannenba:
For an incident report on this problem, take a look at this htcondor-users post.

2015-Aug-05 16:33:19 by johnkn:
From my testing, it looks like the MSI installer does set the START & CONTINUE knobs, but it does not set SUSPEND or PREEMPT. It also does not set use policy : desktop
